course_format: Duration of the course is 8 academic hours. One full day or 2 half-days.
The course includes approximately 40% hands on lab work.
objectives: Be able to setup GitHub Action as a Continuous Integration system.
Run GitHub Actions on Linux, macOS, and MS Windows.
Run GitHub Actions in Docker containers.
prerequisites: An understanding of the cloud-based source-code management.

entries: What kind of things can be done using GitHub Actions
syllabus.title: About GitHub Actions

entries: The basic structure of the YAML configuration files
syllabus.title: Creating the first workflow

entries: Use the secret in the workflows
syllabus.title: Variables and Secrets

target_audience: Software developers and programmers who need to work co-operatively on projects.
text: This course will allow you to get started using GitHub Actions.
It will allow you as a programmer to set up Continuous Integration for your projects.
This will allow you to communicate well with DevOps engineers.
title: GitHub
